description: Manage GPU workloads on SaladCloud, including container groups and inference endpoints. Operate queues, jobs, logs, and quotas to run and monitor deployments. Check CPU/GPU availability to plan capacity and scale efficiently.

capabilities.name: list_container_groups
capabilities.description: List all container groups in a SaladCloud organization and project. Container groups represent scalable sets of identical containers running as distributed services.

capabilities.name: get_container_group
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific container group including its configuration, status, and instances.

capabilities.name: create_container_group
capabilities.description: Create a new container group with specified configuration including image, resources (CPU, memory, GPU), networking, and other settings.

capabilities.name: update_container_group
capabilities.description: Update an existing container group. You can modify replicas, resources, networking, environment variables, and other configuration.

capabilities.name: start_container_group
capabilities.description: Start a stopped container group. This will allocate resources and begin running the containers.

capabilities.name: stop_container_group
capabilities.description: Stop a running container group. This will deallocate resources and stop all running containers.

capabilities.name: delete_container_group
capabilities.description: Delete a container group permanently. This action cannot be undone.

capabilities.name: list_inference_endpoints
capabilities.description: List all available inference endpoints in an organization. Inference endpoints provide ready-to-use AI model APIs.

capabilities.name: get_inference_endpoint
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific inference endpoint including its configuration and metadata.

capabilities.name: list_queues
capabilities.description: List all message queues in a project. Queues enable asynchronous workload processing.

capabilities.name: get_queue
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific message queue.

capabilities.name: create_queue
capabilities.description: Create a new message queue for asynchronous workload processing.

capabilities.name: delete_queue
capabilities.description: Delete a message queue permanently. This action cannot be undone.

capabilities.name: get_quotas
capabilities.description: Get organization resource quotas including limits on container groups, instances, and reallocations.

capabilities.name: get_system_logs
capabilities.description: Get system logs for a container group. Returns logs from container group system events.

capabilities.name: list_container_group_instances
capabilities.description: List all instances of a container group. Instances represent individual running containers within a group.

capabilities.name: get_container_group_instance
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific container group instance.

capabilities.name: update_container_group_instance
capabilities.description: Update a container group instance. Can be used to modify instance settings like deletion cost.

capabilities.name: reallocate_container_group_instance
capabilities.description: Reallocate a container group instance to a different machine.

capabilities.name: recreate_container_group_instance
capabilities.description: Recreate a container group instance on the same machine.

capabilities.name: restart_container_group_instance
capabilities.description: Restart a container group instance.

capabilities.name: update_queue
capabilities.description: Update a message queue configuration.

capabilities.name: list_queue_jobs
capabilities.description: List all jobs in a message queue.

capabilities.name: create_queue_job
capabilities.description: Create a new job in a message queue.

capabilities.name: get_queue_job
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific queue job.

capabilities.name: delete_queue_job
capabilities.description: Delete a job from a message queue.

capabilities.name: list_inference_endpoint_jobs
capabilities.description: List all jobs for a specific inference endpoint.

capabilities.name: create_inference_endpoint_job
capabilities.description: Create a new inference job for an endpoint.

capabilities.name: get_inference_endpoint_job
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific inference job.

capabilities.name: delete_inference_endpoint_job
capabilities.description: Delete an inference job.

capabilities.name: list_gpu_classes
capabilities.description: List all available GPU classes for an organization. GPU classes define the types of GPUs available for container groups.

capabilities.name: get_webhook_secret_key
capabilities.description: Get the webhook secret key for an organization. Used to verify webhook payloads.

capabilities.name: update_webhook_secret_key
capabilities.description: Regenerate the webhook secret key for an organization.

capabilities.name: query_log_entries
capabilities.description: Query log entries for an organization. Retrieve logs matching a query string within a specified time range. Supports pagination and sorting.

capabilities.name: get_cpu_availability
capabilities.description: Get CPU availability information for an organization. Returns available CPU resources.

capabilities.name: get_gpu_availability
capabilities.description: Get GPU availability information for an organization. Returns available GPU resources by class.
